name: tokenlaunch
description: Contracts for fixed-price, finite-supply token sales.

scripts.test:
nohup testrpc -a 100 > /dev/null 2>&1 & 
 echo $! > rpc_pid.txt 
 truffle test 
 if [ $? != 0 ]; then exit 1; fi 
 kill `cat rpc_pid.txt` 
 rm rpc_pid.txt

author: Mike Goldin <mike.goldin@consensys.net>
